definition: to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 經醫院搶救，陳勇軍目前仍處於昏迷之中。

sentences.english: Objective To treat acute myocardial infarction with cardiogenic shock by emegency PCI.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性心肌梗死合併心源性休克的搶救方法。

sentences.english: Two passengers were hospitalized in critical condition, while injuries to the 11 others were less serious.
sentences.chinese: 兩名乘客尚在搶救中，其餘11名乘客傷勢較輕。

sentences.english: It can be used for on-the-spot and bedside treatment.
sentences.chinese: 用於牀旁和基層進行現場搶救治療。

sentences.english: Objective Understanding ingredient blood of feeding in unite rescuing traffic incidents curative effect observing.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解成分血聯合輸注搶救交通傷的療效觀察。

sentences.english: You can often save a person's life by breathing into his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 採用口對口呼吸常能搶救一個人的生命。

sentences.english: Both parents and I rushed to his rescue.
sentences.chinese: 它的父母和我都立即衝過去搶救。

sentences.english: A total of 33 patients rescue success, 7 cases of rescue invalid death.
sentences.chinese: 結果共33例患者搶救成功，7例搶救無效死亡。

sentences.english: A total of 33 patients rescue success, 7 cases of rescue invalid death.
sentences.chinese: 結果共33例患者搶救成功，7例搶救無效死亡。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the salvage and nursing of tin poisoned patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討錫中毒患者的搶救及護理。

sentences.english: He made a dive from the bridge to save the drowning child.
sentences.chinese: 他從橋上跳進水裏去搶救落水兒童。

sentences.english: That museum was also destroyed, and a salvage effort is under way there as well.
sentences.chinese: 這座博物館也被毀掉了，目前那裏也在進行搶救行動。

sentences.english: Venipuncture is a common method used to rescue and treat burned child.
sentences.chinese: 靜脈穿刺是搶救與治療小兒燒傷的常用手段之一。

sentences.english: Please call a pediatric resident to the operation room.
sentences.chinese: 請叫婦產科住院醫師速到搶救室來。

sentences.english: Arrived at the hospital is still in the rescue, Jenny LanLing have worry too crying into a crybaby.
sentences.chinese: 到達醫院時珍妮還在搶救中，藍菱已擔心得哭成淚人。

sentences.english: To save it, plans have been drawn to build a massive wall around the base of the pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 爲了搶救石寶寨，他們打算繞着塔基修築巨大圍堤。

definition: to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
to faint/to swoon/to black out/to become unconscious
